input_text.Prompt:
Given a item title and item keywords, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item title:
#CB2-S3 Celebrity Eyewear Rhinestones Accents Cat Eyes Women's Sunglasses

Item keywords:
Welcome to Nick Nack Mart. Proudly offering 10000+ pair of Designer Inspired Sunglasses!
We offer 100% Authentic Celebrity Eyewear Sunglasses.
Genuine Factory Direct New in Mint Condition.
Each pair of sunglasses offers maximum UV400 protection.
Please Do Not remove the Tag. Please try sunglasses on to ensure proper fit first. 14 days merchandise exchange guarantee.
USPS Standard Shipping Monday thru Friday 8AM-12PM. Guarantee delivery within 3 5 business days. We do not ship on Weekends and Holidays.  We Do Not offer any forms of Expedited Shipping.
Makes for an ideal gift. Thank you kindly for your valued purchase consideration.

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Ooh, these sunglasses are so cool! 😎 They're just like the ones your favorite celebrities wear! 💃🕺 The rhinestones and cat eyes make them look super fancy and stylish. 💅 You'll feel like a star when you wear them! 🌟 They even have UV protection to keep your eyes safe from the sun. ☀️ And, they come in a fancy box with a tag, so you can give them as a gift or keep them for yourself. 🎁👀 So, which color do you like best? 🤔
input_text.Response B:
You can now rock the look of celebrity eyewear at a fraction of the cost with the #CB2-S3 Celebrity Eyewear Rhinestones Accents Cat Eyes Women's Sunglasses! These stunning sunglasses come in a variety of colors to suit your unique style. The rhinestones add a touch of elegance and sophistication, while the cat-eye design gives them a stylish and modern look. With maximum UV400 protection, these sunglasses are perfect for protecting your eyes from the harmful rays of the sun.
Please note that these sunglasses are brand new and still in the factory packaging. They come with a 100% authentic celebrity eyewear tag and a 14-day merchandise exchange guarantee. So, if for any reason you're not completely satisfied with your purchase, you can exchange it for a different pair of sunglasses or get a full refund.
Please do not remove the tag and try the sunglasses on to ensure proper fit before you make a purchase. We do not accept returns or exchanges on opened or worn sunglasses.

Thank you kindly for your valued purchase consideration.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
